Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2015 05:44PM eheinrich wrote: Hi Karen I'm visiting from the March board :). Everyone's responses to treatment seem very individual both between regimens, between folks and even between cycles with each person. First round I escaped most SEs. Second round I felt like I got hit by a truck for about 5 days. Hang in there
